XXvtrksopu:398: pratiṣedhyasya hi śītasparśasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:399: 14) kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhir yathā na romaharṣādiviśeṣayuktapuruṣavān ayaṃ pradeśo dhūmād iti /
XXvtrksopu:400: pratiṣedhyānāṃ romaharṣādiviśeṣānāṃ kāraṇaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:404: pratiṣedhyasya tuṣārasparśasya vyāpakaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:405: 16) kāryaviruddhakāryopalabdhir yathā nehāpratibaddhasāmarthyāni śītakāraṇāni santi dhūmād iti /
XXvtrksopu:406: pratiṣedhyānāṃ śītakāraṇānāṃ kāryaṃ śītaṃ tasya viruddho 'gnis tasya kāryaṃ dhūmas tasya cehopalabdhiḥ //
XXvtrksopu:410: tathā svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādāv apy anupalabdhirūpatā vidyata eva /
XXvtrksopu:411: sahābhāvākṣepikā yasyopalabdhiḥ sā tasyānupalabdhir ity anupalabdhilakṣaṇayogāt /
XXvtrksopu:412: tathā hi yeyaṃ vahner upalabdhiḥ sā śītābhāvam ākṣipati /
XXvtrksopu:413: 11. bhavatv anupalabdhiḥ sā dṛśyatā tu katham /
XXvtrksopu:416: tathā hi yadi śītasparśo dṛśyo bhavet tadā tasyopalabdhiṃ niṣedhyābhāvavyāpto vahnir viruṇaddhy eva /
XXvtrksopu:417: evam abhāvasādhanī sarvaivānupalabdhir vyāptisāmarthyād [Ts_293] dṛśyasyopalabdhiṃ viruṇaddhīti sāmarthyāt svabhāvānupalabdhir bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:419: yasyāṃ tv anupalabdhau tadaiva tam eva pratipattāraṃ prati dṛśyatvaṃ pratiṣedhyasya siddhaṃ dṛśyānupalabdhir eva tasyāḥ svalakṣaṇam iti sākṣāt svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:421: yady api saṃpratitanī dṛśyānupalabdhir nāsti virodhādikāle tv āsīd saiva bhāvapratipattinibandhanam iti /
XXvtrksopu:423: saṃpratitanyaś ca dṛśyānupalabdher abhāvāt tatsvabhāvānupalabdher anyāsām anupalabdhīnāṃ bheda iti /
XXvtrksopu:424: 12. yad api kaiścit svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādīnām anumitānumānatayā dṛśyānupalabdhirūpatocyate /
XXvtrksopu:425: dūrād vahne rūpaviśeṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā uṣṇasparśaviśeṣas taddeśavyāpako 'numīyate tasmāc ca śītasparśābhāvapratītiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:426: āhatya tu dṛśyānupalabdher anudayād dṛśyānupalabdher bhedena nirdeśaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:427: ata eva cānumitānumānam etat kevalam atyantābhyāsāj jhaṭiti tathābhūtapratītyudaye saty ekam anumānam ucyate /
XXvtrksopu:428: vastutas tv anekam anumānam etat evam anyatrāpi vyāpakaviruddhopalambhādāv ūhyam iti dvayam apy etan na manasi toṣam ādadhāti //
XXvtrksopu:430: yo hetor ātmanaḥ sattām apekṣya vidyamāno na hetusattāvyatiriktaṃ kiṃcid dhetum apekṣate /
XXvtrksopu:432: anena ca viśeṣaṇe nāntyāt kāraṇāt kāryaṃ yad utpadyate tasya saṃgrahaḥ [Ts_294] kṛtaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:433: tad api hi tasya svabhāva eva /
XXvtrksopu:435: anyārtham api kṛtam anyārthaṃ bhavatīti nyāyāt paravipratipattir api nirākṛtā /
XXvtrksopu:436: pare hi paścātkālabhāvinam api kṛtakatvādidharmaṃ svabhāvam icchantīti /
XXvtrksopu:438: kāryaṃ yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvair avinābhāvi kāraṇe hetur iti prakṛtam /
XXvtrksopu:439: kāraṇe sādhye yāvadbhiḥ svabhāvair avinābhāvi tair eva hetuḥ /
XXvtrksopu:443: sādhyaś ca vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā anyonyalakṣaṇavyavacchedalakṣaṇatvād anayoḥ /
XXvtrksopu:446: arthāntare tu gamye kāryam iti dvāv etau vidhisādhanau /
XXvtrksopu:449: yasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe sati sādhanārthaḥ sādhyārthaṃ gamayet /
XXvtrksopu:451: nanu svabhāvapratibandham antareṇāpi candrodayāt kumudavikāsapratipattiḥ samudravṛddhiś ca /
XXvtrksopu:454: tat katham ucyate svabhāvapratibandhe saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayed iti /
XXvtrksopu:458: yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥsa tarn apratibaddhaviṣayam avaśyam eva na na vyabhicaratīti nāsti tayor avyabhicāraniyamaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:460: tathā hi hetudharmasyaiva tādṛśo 'trānumitir yatrāmbhojabodhādaya ekakālā jātāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:462: vāyuviśeṣa eva ca yaḥ kṛttikādyudayakāraṇaṃsa eva hi saṃtatyā rohiṇyādyudayakāraṇaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:475: svabhāvapratibandhe hi saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayed iti /
XXvtrksopu:480: viruddhopalabdhyādau tu tattadviviktapradeśādikāryatvāt tādṛśasya [Ts_296] dahanādes tadutpattinibandhana eva iti // //
XXvtrksopu:483: pūrvam uktaṃ yat trirūpaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya yat prakāśakaṃ vacanaṃ tat parārtham anumānaṃ kāraṇe kāryopacārāt /
XXvtrksopu:492: visadṛśo dharmo yasya sa vidharmā tasya bhāvo vaidharmyam /
XXvtrksopu:495: yasya ca vaidharmyam abhidheyaṃ tad vaidharmyavat /
XXvtrksopu:496: nanu ca sādharmyavati sādhanavākye vyatireko nāsti /
XXvtrksopu:497: vaidharmyavati cānvayas tat kathaṃ trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parārtham anumānaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:501: sādharmyābhidheyena yukte prayoge samarthyād vyatirekasya pratītis tasmāt trirūpaliṅgākhyānam /
XXvtrksopu:502: tasmin vyatireke buddhyāvasīyamāne 'sati sādhyena hetor anvayasya buddhyāvasitasyābhāvāt //
XXvtrksopu:506: tatheti yathānvayavākye tathārthād eva vaidharmyeṇa prayoge 'nvayasyānabhidhīyamānasyāpi gatiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:507: asati tasminn anvaye buddhigṛhīte sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddher anavasāyāt /
XXvtrksopu:508: tasmād ekenāpi vākyenānvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayor liṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bḥavatīti nāvaśyaṃ vākyadvayaprayogaḥ //
XXvtrksopu:509: 4. tatrānupalabdheḥ sādharmyavān prayogaḥ yad yatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ san nopalabhyate sa tatrāsadvyavahāraviṣayaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:511: nopalabhyate ca kvacitpradeśaviśeṣa upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa iti /
XXvtrksopu:512: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇaḥ śaśaśirasaḥ sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśaviśeṣasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptapratiṣedhyānupalambhahetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam //
XXvtrksopu:514: yat sat tat sarvam anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ saṃś ca śabdaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:521: sā ca bhāvasyātmabhūtaiva kevalaṃ kalpanayā vyatirekiṇīva pradarśyate /
XXvtrksopu:522: yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtakaś ca śabda iti vyatiriktaviśeṣaṇasya /
XXvtrksopu:523: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi svabhāvaniṣpattau bhāvaḥ kṛtaka iti /
XXvtrksopu:525: atra hi dṛṣṭāntadharmibhiḥ sādhyadharmiṇāṃ hetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:526: sarva ete sādhanadharmā yathāsvaṃ [Ts_298] pramāṇaiḥ siddhasādhanadharmamātrānubandha eva sādhyadharme 'vagantavyāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:531: yatra yatra dhūmas tatra tatra vahnir yathā mahānase /
XXvtrksopu:533: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇo mahānasasya sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśaviśeṣasya dhūmahetukṛtaṃ sādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:534: ihāpi tribhir anupalambhair dvābhyāṃ pratyakṣābhyāṃ siddhe kāryakāraṇabhave kāraṇe sādhye kāryahetur vaktavyaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:539: atra hi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇo nilaviśeṣasya sādhyadharmiṇaś ca pradeśasyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaniṣedhyānupalambhākhyahetukṛtaṃ vaisādṛśyam abhidheyam /
XXvtrksopu:540: 7. svabhāvahetor vaidharmyavantaḥ prayogāḥ asaty anityatve nāsti kvacit sattvaṃ yathā gaganamaline /
XXvtrksopu:542: asaty anityatve na kvacid utpattimattvaṃ yathākāśe /
XXvtrksopu:544: asaty anityatve na kvacit kṛtakatvaṃ yathā kurmaromni /
XXvtrksopu:546: atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ vaisadṛśyam abhidheyam //
XXvtrksopu:548: asaty agnau na bhavaty eva dhūmo yathā mahāhrade /
XXvtrksopu:550: [Ts_299] atra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇā sādhyadharmiṇo hetukṛtaṃ vaisadṛśyam abhidheyam //
XXvtrksopu:551: 9. trirūpaliṅgākhyānaṃ parārtham anumānam ity arthān na pakṣādivacanam anumānam uktaṃ bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:552: tatra pratijñā tāvan na sākṣāt sādhanam /
XXvtrksopu:554: artha eva hy arthaṃ gamayati pratibandhān /
XXvtrksopu:558: sādhyasādhanadharmaviśeṣopadarśanārtham anavayavabhūtāpi pratijñā dṛṣṭāntavat prayujyata iti cet /
XXvtrksopu:560: evaṃ hy anujñādivākyam api prayoktavyaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:561: na hi tair vinā eva sādhanasya pravṛttir saṃbhavati /
XXvtrksopu:564: tathā hi yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ kṛtakaś ca śabda ity etāvanmātre prayukte 'nityaḥ śabda iti pratītir bhavaty evāntareṇa pratijñāvacanam /
XXvtrksopu:568: asati hi pratijñānirdeśe pakṣāpekṣānibandhanaṃ trairūpyaṃ nāstīti /
XXvtrksopu:570: tathā hi pratijñāvacanam antareṇāpi sarvaṃ saṃpadyata eva /
XXvtrksopu:571: upanayanasya punar arthaḥ pakṣadharmavacanenaiva nirdiṣṭa iti na tatpūrvake tasya kaścid upayogaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:572: vyāptipūrvake vacane pakṣadharmavacanād eva tadarthasiddheḥ kim anenopanayena /
XXvtrksopu:582: asiddhau saṃdehe vā pratipādyasya pratipādakasya hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:583: 11. tatraikasya rūpasya dharmisaṃbandhasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cāsiddho hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:585: cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇaṃ prativādyasiddham /
XXvtrksopu:587: acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti sādhya utpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā sāṃkhyasya svayaṃvādino 'siddham /
XXvtrksopu:588: atra cotpattimattvam anityatvaṃ vā paryāyeṇa hetur na yugapat tathā hi parārtho hetūpanyāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:589: parasya cāsata utpāda utpattimattvaṃ sataś ca niranvayo vināśo 'nityatvaṃ siddham iti /
XXvtrksopu:591: yathā bāspādibhāvena saṃdigdho bhūtasaṃghāto 'gnisiddhau bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ saṃghātaḥ samūho 'gnisiddhyartham upādīyamāno 'siddhaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:592: yathā ceha nikūñjemayūraḥ kekāyitād iti tadāpātadeśavibhrame /
XXvtrksopu:593: āpātanam āpātas tasya kekāyitasyāpāta utpādas tasya deśas tasya vibhramo bhrāntiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:594: atha vā āpataty āgacchaty asmād ity āpātaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:597: yat punar ucyate 'nyair āpāta āgamanam iti tad ayuktam /
XXvtrksopu:605: tasmād yady ayam ātmā sarvagato na bhavet /
XXvtrksopu:606: kathaṃ dakṣiṇāpatha upalabdhāḥ sukhādayo madhyadeśa upalabhyante /
XXvtrksopu:607: ākāśavad iti dṛṣṭānte ākāśasya guṇaḥ śabdaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:608: sa ca yathā vikāriṇi puruṣa upalabhyate tathānyatrāpīti /
XXvtrksopu:609: syād eṣa hetur yadi bauddhasya sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvam ātmanaḥ siddhaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:613: yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatraikadeśe ca vartamānaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:618: nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvād ity atra nityatve sādhye prameyatvaṃ sapakṣavipakṣayor vartate /
XXvtrksopu:619: ekadeśe ca vartamāna ity atrāpi sapakṣavipakṣayor iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:621: na kevalaṃ sapakṣavipakṣavyāpi [Ts_302] prameyatvam anaikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:624: yo vā sapakṣavipakṣayor ekadeśavṛttiḥ sarvo 'sāv anaikāntiko hetvābhāsa iti /
XXvtrksopu:625: tatra prayatnānantariyakaḥ śabdo 'nityatvād ghaṭavad ity ayaṃ vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:626: vidyuti vartamānatvād ākāśādāv avartamānatvāt sapakṣavyāpī tu bhavaty eva /
XXvtrksopu:635: asparśatvaṃ hi vipakṣaikadeśe buddhyādau sapakṣaikadeśe cākāśādau vartata ity ubhayapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:638: yathā sarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:639: sarvatraikadeśe vā sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:644: sapakṣe sattvasyāsapakṣe cāsattvasya yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddhahetvābhāsaḥ //
XXvtrksopu:646: anayoḥ [Ts_303] sapakṣe 'sattvam asapakṣe ca sattvam iti viparyayasiddhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:648: dvayo rūpayor ekasyāsiddhāv aparasya ca saṃdehe 'naikāntikaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:653: yathā vītarāgaḥ sarvajño vā vaktṛtvād iti /
XXvtrksopu:655: sarvajñavītarāgayor viprakarṣād vacanādes tatra sattvam asattvaṃ vā saṃdigdham /
XXvtrksopu:658: na hi sātmakānatmakābhyām anyo rāśir asti yatra praṇādir vartate /
XXvtrksopu:662: 15. evam eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāṃ ekaikasya dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca yathāyogam asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikās trayo hetvābhāsāḥ /
XXvtrksopu:667: tathā dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca yathāyogam iti yathāsaṃbhavam /
XXvtrksopu:669: tathā sapakṣe sattvasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cānaikāntika uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:670: evam ekaikasya rūpasyāsiddhau saṃdehe cāsiddho 'naikāntikaś ca hetvābhāsa [Ts_304] uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:671: tathā dvayor dvayo rūpayor viparyayasiddhau viruddho hetvābhāsa uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:672: asapakṣe sattvasya ca saṃdehe vā 'naikāntika uktaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:673: tathā sapakṣāsapakṣayor api hetoḥ sadasattvasaṃdehe 'naikāntika eva /
XXvtrksopu:674: evaṃ dvayor dvayor asiddhau saṃdehe ca viruddho 'naikāntikaś ca hetvābhāsa iti /
XXvtrksopu:675: 16. nanu katham uktaṃ trayo hetvābhāsā iti /
XXvtrksopu:676: yāvatā vaiphalyam api hetoḥ pṛthagdūṣaṇam asti / tad uktam /
XXvtrksopu:677: sādhanaṃ yad vivādena nyastaṃ tac cen na sādhyate /
XXvtrksopu:678: kiṃ sādhyam anyathāniṣṭaṃ bhaved vaiphalyam eva vā // iti
XXvtrksopu:679: atra kecid āhuḥ satyam asty eva vaiphalyaṃ hetoḥ pṛthagdūṣaṇaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:680: yat punar asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikakathanaṃ viniścayādau tad asāmarthyaprabhedena /
XXvtrksopu:685: syād etad yadi vaiyarthyaṃ nāma hetor dūṣaṇaṃ syāt kiṃ tu pramāṇasya /
XXvtrksopu:687: adhigatam api gamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭaṃ piṣṭaṃ syād iti /
XXvtrksopu:690: karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanaṃ kim itīṣyata iti
XXvtrksopu:691: tataś ca katham idaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣaṇam /
XXvtrksopu:692: [Ts_305] athaivam ucyate pramāṇājanakatvād dhetur api vyartha ucyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:693: evaṃ hi vāstavam idaṃ hetor na dūṣaṇaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:696: yadi vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣanaṃ bhinnaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:700: tathā vaiyarthyapratipakṣeṇāpy anyad rūpam uktaṃ syāt /
XXvtrksopu:702: yadi tarhīdaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ na pṛthagdūṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ tarhy anena vādī nigṛhyate //
XXvtrksopu:709: nedaṃ hetor dūṣaṇaṃ kiṃ tu parārthānumāne vaktur api guṇadoṣāś cintyante iti viphalābhidhāyī apratibhayaiva nigṛhyata iti /
XXvtrksopu:710: tathā hi prakṛtam eva sādhyaṃ nāprakṛtam iti sādhyatāyāḥ prakṛter niyāmaka eṣa panthā /
XXvtrksopu:712: doṣāḥ punar nyūnatvam asiddhir vādinā sādhayitum iṣṭasyārthasya viparyayasādhanam aṣṭādaśa dṛṣṭāntadoṣāś ceti /
XXvtrksopu:713: atra ca yac codyaṃ parihāraśca tad granthavistarabhayān na likhitam iti /
XXvtrksopu:714: sthitam etad [Ts_306] yadi vaiyarthyaṃ hetor dūṣaṇaṃ tadāsiddha evāntarbhavati /
XXvtrksopu:716: 18. triIakṣaṇo hetur uktas tāvatārthapratītir iti na pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayavaḥ kaścit /
XXvtrksopu:717: tena nāsya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthag ucyate gatārthatvāt /
XXvtrksopu:718: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttī rūpam uktam abhedena i punar aviśeṣeṇa kāryasvabhāvayor janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāv uktau /
XXvtrksopu:720: hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam iti sādhyenānugatam idam ekaṃ rūpam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttir iti sādhyanivṛttyā nivṛttir asya dvitīyaṃ rūpam uktam /
XXvtrksopu:724: tac ca darśayatā dhūmas tatrāgnir iti asaty agnau na kvacid dhumo yathā mahānasetarayoḥ /
XXvtrksopu:725: yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatrānityatvam anityatvābhāve kṛtakatvāsaṃbhavo yathā ghaṭākāśayor iti darśanīyam /
XXvtrksopu:726: na hy anyathā sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye darśayituṃ /
XXvtrksopu:728: tasyāgnyādeḥ kāryaṃ tatkāryaṃ tasya bhāvas tatkāryatā /
XXvtrksopu:729: na hy anyathā śakyo darśayitum iti liṅgavacanavipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam //
XXvtrksopu:730: 19. asmiṃś cārthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:733: etenaiveti hetulakṣaṇābhidhānenaiva dṛṣṭāntasyāpi sāmarthyād gatārthatvena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā [Ts_307] api sādhanatvena pratyākhyātā bhavanti /
XXvtrksopu:734: yena hetoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ yathoktaṃ pradarśyate sa saṃyagdṛṣṭāntaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:735: yena punas tasya lakṣaṇadvayaṃ na pradarśyate so dṛṣṭāntābhāsa ity uktaṃ bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:739: atra hi karmaṇi nityatvaṃ sādhyadharmo nāsti /
XXvtrksopu:752: rathyāpuruṣe vacanaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva niścitam iti sādhanadharmas tatra siddhaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:756: rathyāpuruṣe maraṇadharmatvaṃ sādhyadharma utpattimattvādinā liṅgena niścitaṃ rāgādimattvaṃ tv aniścitam iti saṃdigdhasādhanadharmā /
XXvtrksopu:760: yatra sādhyena hetor vyāptir nāsti so 'nanvayaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:763: na hi rāgādīnāṃ vacanasya tādātmyalakṣaṇas tadutpattilakṣano vā pratibandho 'sti yenātrānvayaḥ [Ts_308] syāt /
XXvtrksopu:767: na tu vacanenākhyāta ity avidyamāna ivāsau /
XXvtrksopu:771: atra hi yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam ity anvaye vaktavye yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti viparītam anvayaṃ karoti sarva ete dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ sādharmyeṇa //
XXvtrksopu:791: saṃdigdhasādhanvyatirekaḥ yathā na trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhyavacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvāt /
XXvtrksopu:793: ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantas tad yathā gautamādayo dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāraḥ /
XXvtrksopu:805: yatra vītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti /
XXvtrksopu:807: tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddher avyatirekaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:809: yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ākāśavad iti vaidharmyeṇa /
XXvtrksopu:810: yo hy anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād iti prayoge vaidharmyeṇākāśavad iti brūyāt tena vidyamāno 'pi vyatireko na pradarśitaḥ tathā /
XXvtrksopu:811: yadāśeṣapadārthopasaṃhāreṇānityatvābhāve kṛtakatvābhāvo yathākāśavad iti karoti tadā vyatireko darśito bhavati /
XXvtrksopu:815: atra hi yan nityaṃ tad akṛtakam iti vaktavye /
XXvtrksopu:816: yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityam iti vadati //
XXvtrksopu:817: 21. na hy ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsair hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣe cāsattvam eva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vā /
XXvtrksopu:818: ebhiḥ sādhyavikalair dṛṣṭāntābhāsair hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ niścayena na śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ veti saṃbandhanīyaṃ tadarthāpattyaiṣāṃ nirāso veditavyaḥ /
XXvtrksopu:819: yasmād ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsair dvividham api lakṣaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ darśayitum /
XXvtrksopu:825: dṛṣṭāntadoṣāś ca gṛhyante ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktās teṣām udbhāvanaṃ tena pareṣṭārthasiddhipratibandhāt /
XXvtrksopu:826: anena ca yad ahrīkeṇoktaṃ viparyayasādhanam eva dūṣaṇaṃ nānyad iti tad api parāstaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ /
XXvtrksopu:830: niścayābhāvo vā bhavati niścayaviparyaya ity asty eva viparyayasiddhiḥ /
XXvtrksopu:836: yat tarkasopānam idaṃ vidhāya puṇyaṃ mayāptaṃ śaradinduśubhram /
XXvtrksopu:837: tenottamāṃ bodhim ahaṃ labheya lokaś ca niryātu bhavād aśeṣaḥ //
